channel.title: Changing Text
channel.description:
Hey I Was Wondering How Would Change The Quest Names In The Quest tab So it Would Say My Server And Below That if I Pressed The One That Says "Full Dragon" A Set Of Full Dragon Will Appear In My Inventory Like It Runs The Command?...
-Busta

item.title: Changing Text
item.dc:creator: @Busta_Blader Busta Blader
item.description:
@Busta_Blader wrote:

Thx Soo Much I’m Doing It Now…

-Busta

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Text
item.dc:creator: @hallowed_soul hallowed soul
item.description:
@hallowed_soul wrote:

Yawn…Ok Mate, This Is What You Do…Search For the text that you want to change in your client java, when you have found it, replace it with full dragon or dragon or whatever, then search case 1 and under the break; copy case 1 and paste it under the break; then change the case number to the number that comes up in the top left corner when u hover your mouse over it, then add addItem(ITEM ID, AMOUNT); And Repeat, Then Save/Compile/Run And Test..

Read full topic
